description: XDR Dashboard displays key metrics like lag, bytes-shipped related to the data backup and transfer status between each data-center and namespaces configuted

panels.description:
Total Throughput (sum across all namespaces and all DCs)

Average XDR Lag

Average Ship Latency

Average Lap us (Time taken to process records across partitions in one lap)

Total recoveries pending

Total In Progress

Total In Queue
panels.title: XDR Statistics Summary

panels.description: Number of nodes in the destination DC as seen by XDR (Average)
panels.title: DC Nodes

panels.description: XDR throughput
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: Number of records successfully shipped
panels.title: Success

panels.description: Number of ships abandoned
panels.title: Abandoned (rate)

panels.description: Number of XDR local read not found
panels.title: Not Found (rate)

panels.description: How many records are skipped after XDR reading the record locally but before putting them on wire
panels.title: Filtered Out (rate)

panels.description: Number of retries due to connection reset
panels.title: Retry Connection Reset (rate)

panels.description: Number of retries due to temporary error from destination
panels.title: Retry Destination (rate)

panels.description: Number of times a record write is skipped from processing because that record is already pending processing
panels.title: Hot Keys (rate)

panels.description: Number of XDR processing record in progress
panels.title: In Progress

panels.description: Number of records waiting to be processed in in-memory transaction queue
panels.title: In Queue

panels.description: It signifies how much behind the destination is compared to the source. In other words, so much time worth of data is yet to be shipped from source to destination
panels.title: Lag

panels.description: Time taken to process records across partitions in one lap. A higher number indicates slowness of source in processing the records.
panels.title: Lap μs

panels.description: Number of partitions that are recovered by reducing the primary index of that partition
panels.title: Recoveries (rate)

panels.description: Number of recoveries that are currently pending
panels.title: Recoveries Pending

panels.description: Average network latency for the successfully shipped records
panels.title: Latency ms

panels.description: Average XDR compression ratio
panels.title: Avg Compression Ratio

panels.description: How much % of records are not compressed because they are below the compression threshold
panels.title: Uncompressed Pct

panels.description: Number of bytes shipped for a namespace to a DC by XDR.
panels.title: Bytes Shipped (rate)

title: XDR View (Aerospike 5.0+ only)
